text: The 2011–12 FC Augsburg season was the 105th season in the football club's history and the club's first season in the Bundesliga. The season started on 30 July against Rot-Weiß Oberhausen in the DFB-Pokal. Promotion to the 2011–12 Bundesliga was the peak of a decade-long process started by clothing magnate Walther Seinisch. ==Review and events== 2011–12 season was the club's debut season in the Bundesliga. ==Competitions== ===Bundesliga=== ====League table==== ====Matches==== ===DFB-Pokal=== ==Player information== ===Roster and statistics=== Squad Season 2011–12 Player Bundesliga DFB-Pokal Totals Player Nat.
